marklogic.body:
Lying in public is very much a part of the Mysery Man's make up. He is a half caste in every way, lying is a given right by islam standards because infidels are not worth wasting the truth on,soft words and split tongued thinking is a way of putting a dubious agenda in place without arousing major ire and angst.
Do as I say, is a motto of the left and the left suits his manner, his entitlement mentality is a soothing way to Gain even more control and build a large all encompassing government so bound in breauacracy and red tape that it is impossible to defeat and change, with the exception of a major overthrow by a revolution.
The Mysery Man has been schooled well in how this agenda of the benign smoothering of freedom is to be handled and if you will take note, his minions are being put into every key Spot of law and leadership this government has to offer, the suffocation of civil liberty, rights is taking place and the removal of this nation is proceeding as planned.
